game_task.title: storyline_escape_eliminate_gunslinger
game_task.text_desc: gunslinger_clan_cache

game_task.title: Talk to Duty's Outpost Commander
game_task.text_desc: You need to talk to the Duty soldiers at the outpost.

game_task.title: Talk to Toad.
game_task.text_desc: So, with the Barkeep everything is not so easy and fast. He needs time, maybe a couple of days, to sort out these documents from the NII case... In the meantime, Toad has some talk...

game_task.title: Find the documents on the territory of Chernobyl NPP
game_task.text_desc: find_stancia_last_doc_desc

objective.text: Find documents on the territory of the Chernobyl NPP

game_task.title: Artifact for Toad
game_task.text_desc: Toad offers a large sum of money if you get him a certain artifact in the Silent Hills. I don't think we should refuse his request...

objective.text: Find the group and destroy the Assassins at the Silent Hills Farm.
Get information on the location of the artifact.

game_task.title: Parcel for Toad
game_task.text_desc: jababoxone_task_text

objective.text: Package for Toad at the roadblock
Leave the container and take another one

game_task.title: Destroy a group of bandits at the Rostok factory
game_task.text_desc: jresy_kill_desc

objective.text: Destroy a group of bandits at the Rostok factory
Find and destroy the bandit group

game_task.title: Destroy the bandit group in Bar
game_task.text_desc: The next group of bandits calling themselves the Rippers... according to the Informant are now in Bar...

objective.text: Destroy the bandit group in Bar.
Find and destroy the bandit group.

game_task.title: Destroy the bandit group in the Dark Valley.
game_task.text_desc: Another group of bandits. Now in the Dark Valley... calling themselves the Cowboys. something or other.

objective.text: Destroy the bandit group in Dark Valley.
Find and destroy the bandit group

game_task.title: Destroy the bandit group at the MedPribor Research Institute.
game_task.text_desc: The last group of bandits. Some Merry Tourists. They are located in the central complex of the research institute, only the leader needs to be taken out. The rest are at your discretion.

objective.text: Destroy a group of bandits at the MedPribor Research Institute.
Find and destroy the group of bandits and its Leader.
Talk to the Informant in the Bar alone.

game_task.title: Find the missing scientists
game_task.text_desc: A group of scientists from the Lake Yantar Science Camp disappeared in the central building of the institute. It is necessary to find them.

objective.text: Explore the central complex on Lake Yantar

game_task.title: Find the missing scientists on Silent Hills.
game_task.text_desc: uchenie_holmy_start_article_text

objective.text: Find the missing scientists on Silent Hills

game_task.title: Find the Journalist in Bright Ray
game_task.text_desc: Journalist: I will be in the territory where the Freedom group is ruling, find me in one of the houses on the outskirts of the city.

objective.text: Find the Journalist in Svetly Lucha

game_task.title: Talk to Cobalt.
game_task.text_desc: A certain Cobalt has contacted me. He asks for a meeting in the former building of the School...

objective.text: Talk to Cobalt at the bar in the school building.

game_task.title: Meet with the Clear Sky group at the MedPribor Research Institute.
game_task.text_desc: I met someone named Cobalt. Apparently a serious scientist. does a lot of stuff. He gave me a tip that his group at MedPribor Research Institute might have a job offer.

objective.text: Meet the Clear Sky group at MedPribor Research Institute.
Meet the Clear Sky group at MedPribor, they might have a job.

game_task.title: Talk to John Doe
game_task.text_desc: Received a message from a certain Mediator - You are looking for a Journalist, I understand correctly. I can help you with your search. I'll meet you at the Bar. The first house from the entrance to the Garbage. Waiting. Then I got a code-- 0481. What's it for?

objective.text: Talk to an unknown stalker in the bar.

game_task.title: The underground pens.
game_task.text_desc: zagony_text

objective.text: Find the entrance to the underground pens behind the Rostok factory site.
Find a scout and data about the place

game_task.title: Tracking the traitor
game_task.text_desc: There's a rat loose in Duty's ranks... According to rumors, he is now at a roadblock on the Garbage... We should try to track him down...

objective.text: Track down the alleged traitor at Duty's roadblock in the Garbage.

game_task.title: Death Lamp
game_task.text_desc: Got a tip on some mysterious artifact. It may be possible to earn some money...

objective.text: Find a group of stalkers who found the death-lamp.

game_task.title: Find the knife in the dungeons of the Rostok factory
game_task.text_desc: nloudmoth_1

objective.text: Find the knife in the dungeons of Rostok factory

game_task.title: Destroy the pack of rats in the Garbage.
game_task.text_desc: Duty doesn't like the fact that hordes of rats are coming from the Dark Valley... You need to destroy the pack and its leader - the rat wolf, who usually stays away from the pack...

objective.text: Destroy the pack of rats in the Garbage near the hangar.

game_task.title: Talk to the head of the duty guard
game_task.text_desc: When you first entered the territory of the Bar, you received a message from a certain Kravtsov. Perhaps he is one of the leaders of Duty. Well. it's worth finding him and talking to him.

objective.text: Talk to Duty's head of security

game_task.title: Bring the zombie
game_task.text_desc: A zombified, non-aggressive stalker was seen in Bar's territory, near the Rostok factory. You need to bring him to Bar.

objective.text: Find a zombified veteran near Rostok factory in Bar.
Bring the zombified veteran to Bar

game_task.title: Wait for Goplit's PDA decryption.
game_task.text_desc: Cobalt from Clear Sky has agreed to decrypt Goplit's PDA. However, it will take some time. After his work is done, he promised to get in touch. Two dead heads are needed for the work.

objective.text: Wait for Goplit's PDA to be decrypted.
Find the Dead Head artifact for the decryption fee.

game_task.title: Talk to Lone Wolf.
game_task.text_desc: Hmm... him again. What does he want this time?

objective.text: To talk to the Lone Wolf.
Talk to the Lone Wolf who seems to be following me.

game_task.title: To cleanse the city.
game_task.text_desc: descr_deadcity_paras_start

objective.text: Cleanse the city of the parasite.
Find the sources of the infestation.
Talk to Owl about what to do next.
Destroy the sources of the infestation

game_task.title: Talk to Duty leader
game_task.text_desc: jurnwtf_hel22lo_sms

objective.text: Meet and talk to Duty leader

game_task.title: Talk to the barman
game_task.text_desc: Duty and the Barkeep are preparing for a sortie to Radar. It's going to take some time. It's worth getting ready for me. When everything is ready, he will inform me on the PDA... In the meantime, it's worth going back to the Swamps... someone's been asking about me there.

objective.text: Talk to the Barkeep after the expedition to Radar has been assembled.

game_task.title: Talk to the Professor.
game_task.text_desc: Phantasm is destroyed... you'll have to talk to the Professor.

objective.text: Talk to the Professor and give him the emulator.

game_task.title: Sleep in the scientists' bunker.
game_task.text_desc: This battle with the creature. I'm exhausted. I need to rest, there is a sleeping place with a mattress in the bunker...

objective.text: Sleep in the scientists' bunker, and regain your strength for the trek.

game_task.title: Talk to the Barkeep.
game_task.text_desc: The installation on the lake is disabled, you need to talk to the Barkeep about further actions.

game_task.title: Destroy the pack of dogs
game_task.text_desc: As it turns out, the entrance fee here isn't a one-time fee. Barkeep Rat is only willing to talk after I destroy the pack of dogs... or perhaps there are other options?

game_task.title: Destroy the Mind Swamp.
game_task.text_desc: So, in order to destroy a certain Phantasm, you have to destroy another mutant... The professor calls it the Mind Swamp. According to him, it's located in the Bright Ray, in the swamp.

game_task.title: Destroy Phantasm
game_task.text_desc: It turns out that the Duty Leader is also interested in finding Strelok. In his opinion, he is a major threat and needs to be eliminated. He is rumored to be on the Radar territory now, subject to psi-zombification, but it is impossible to get to the Radar now - the territory is still under Psi radiation, the possible culprit of which is a certain Phantasm. We need to talk to the Professor, maybe he can help with this case...

game_task.title: Fend off the monster attack
game_task.text_desc: After turning off the emitter at Yantar, a large wave of mutants is coming from the Rostok factory towards the Bar. You need to help Duty to destroy them.

objective.text: Repel the attack of monsters from Rostok factory

game_task.title: Get the Psi Stabilizer
game_task.text_desc: Without Psi-Stabilizer you won't last long in the Dark Valley... You should talk to someone in the Bar, you might be able to get it there.

objective.text: Get the Psi-Stabilizer to go to the Dark Valley.

game_task.title: Find Strelok's stash in the dungeons of the Rostok factory.
game_task.text_desc: Rat shared information that there was rumored to be a Strelok stash in the underground rooms of the Rostok Factory...

objective.text: Find a stash in the Rostok factory

game_task.title: Barkeep's car
game_task.text_desc: cddaqiyorbar_1

objective.text: Find a truck behind the Rostok factory on the territory of the Bar.
Drive the truck to the Bar

game_task.title: bar_ryaboy_job
game_task.text_desc: bar_ryaboy_art

game_task.title: Go with the group to explore Rostok.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like the group is ready... We need to talk to Gatsula.

objective.text: Go with the group to explore the Grove.
Talk to the leader of the veteran group
Go with the group to explore the Grove and then talk to the Barkeep.

game_task.title: Reconnaissance
game_task.text_desc: The veteran group in Bar is planning to sneak into the Rostok factory. You need to explore the area behind the factory, and talk about what you've seen.

objective.text: Get to the factory and investigate what's going on there
Get to the area behind the plant.
Explore the approach to the plant

game_task.title: Destroy the controller
game_task.text_desc: warfare

objective.text: Destroy the controller in the Silent Hills.
Destroy the controller on Silent Hills

game_task.title: Find documents at Rostok factory
game_task.text_desc: Duty leader reported about some documents that are at the Rostok factory. Their location is attached. We need to get them to him. Is he looking for something?

objective.text: Bring the documents to Duty's leader

game_task.title: Find the documents in the lab
game_task.text_desc: descr_bar_x16_documents

game_task.title: Find out the situation on Silent Hills
game_task.text_desc: You need to find out the situation on Silent Hills and then talk to the Professor on Yantar. Hmm. what's this about? Rat's obviously up to something.

objective.text: Check the situation on Silent Hills and talk to the Professor on Yantar.
Find out the situation on Silent Hills

game_task.title: Get to Pripyat.
game_task.text_desc: It looks like the road to the city is open now...

game_task.title: Shut down the Woodpecker One installation.
game_task.text_desc: radar_deac_datel_1_task_text

game_task.title: Open the door to the control room of the installation
game_task.text_desc: It looks like this door leads to the Radar installation control room. We need to find a way to open it.

objective.text: Open the door to the plant control room
Find a way to open the door to the control room

game_task.title: Kill the bloodsucker
game_task.text_desc: An old bloodsucker, the most powerful member of his species, who has created his own lair out of the territory of the abandoned Rostok factory. You need to find and destroy him...

objective.text: Kill the bloodsucker at the Rostok factory

game_task.title: Talk to the stalker
game_task.text_desc: Damn it. that's what these mercenaries are all about-- selling and selling and selling. and that's what they paid for. Looks like the Duty fighters raided their base. I need to find and talk to whoever sent me the message.

objective.text: Talk to the stalker from Duty

game_task.title: Escape
game_task.text_desc: krvzovpobeg_name

objective.text: Find Kravtsov's brother at the base, who is involved in the murderous clan.
Talk to Major Kravtsov and his brother.

game_task.title: Destroy the renegade in the Dark Valley.
game_task.text_desc: Another assassination... Now it's time to take out an unwanted brother of theirs... He's hiding in a trailer in the Valley.

objective.text: Destroy the renegade in the Dark Valley.
Find and kill a renegade who knows a lot.
Talk to the leader of the assassins

game_task.title: Destroy the stalker
game_task.text_desc: killerdol_one_sttex

objective.text: Find and kill a stalker at the MedPribor Research Institute.
Talk to the leader of the assassins

game_task.title: Destroy the rookies who arrived from Cordon.
game_task.text_desc: Need to destroy the uninvited guests from Cordon...

game_task.title: Bring the artifact in the hangar.
game_task.text_desc: A strange artifact was seen in the hangar at the Garbage... You need to find it and bring it to Toad.

objective.text: Find the artifact in the hangars of the Garbage for Toad.

map_location_type.hint: The location where the artifact was seen

game_task.title: Turn on the lights in the underground lab.
game_task.text_desc: Damn, looks like the front door's closed. and the lights are out. We should try turning on the power, maybe that will open the front door too.

objective.text: Turn on the lights in the underground lab.

game_task.title: Talk to the stalker.
game_task.text_desc: Some strange guy sent an audio message. Says he wants to meet. Maybe he's the one who can tell you how to get into the lab.

objective.text: Meet an unknown stalker in the Dark Valley.

game_task.title: Bring the rookies to the slug camp.
game_task.text_desc: It seems that the local bandit group has some kind of a grudge against the rookies who have arrived here. You need to find them and bring them to the slug camp.

objective.text: Escort the Stalkers to the Black Slug base.

game_task.title: Talk to the Doctor.
game_task.text_desc: Doctor: Stalker, come to my hut, I have a conversation... It's about the Journalist.

objective.text: Talk to the Doctor in the swamp

game_task.title: Find the dark stalker in the dungeons.
game_task.text_desc: His mark is displayed on the map, here in the dungeons... Who could it be?

objective.text: Find a dark stalker in the dungeons.
Find one of the dark stalkers in the dungeons that tried to take me prisoner.

game_task.title: Break into the lab on the generators.
game_task.text_desc: It can't be. Is this another dream? I have to break into the lab under the generators, no matter what it takes...

objective.text: Break into the lab on the generators.
Break into the lab under the generators.

game_task.title: Help brain mass 9 build a gravity wagon.
game_task.text_desc: The mutant from the lab asked me to find me to bring parts for a gravity wagon with which he can leave the lab.

objective.text: Help Brain Mass #9 build a gravity wagon.
Find the parts of the wagon

game_task.title: Kill the military man on Cordon
game_task.text_desc: Toad agrees to help with the rubble at the MedPribor Research Institute, he will hire some stalkers to dismantle it. In return, I need to quietly and discreetly destroy the military man on Cordon.

objective.text: Hide in a tree near the bridge.

game_task.title: Help evacuate the science team on Cordon.
game_task.text_desc: enc_esc_evacuation

objective.text: Help with the evacuation of the scientific group
Escort the group to the helicopter landing site

game_task.title: Find a meeting place for Monolith fanatics
game_task.text_desc: dc_mono2

objective.text: Find the meeting place of Monolith fanatics
Find the meeting place of Monolith fanatics near the road to the Swamps

game_task.title: Destroy the lab
game_task.text_desc: We need to finish what the Journalist started... we need to destroy this place.

objective.text: Destroy the lab under the generators
Destroy the lab under the generators.
Bring the children to the surface

game_task.title: Find the Journalist
game_task.text_desc: bunker_find_journl_fin_task_text

objective.text: Find the Journalist who is missing outside the power plant

game_task.title: Talk to the Doctor in the swamp.
game_task.text_desc: The Doctor? I think I got a message from him.

objective.text: Talk to the Doctor in the swamp.
Talk to the Doctor in the swamp.

game_task.title: Talk to the scientists in the swamp.
game_task.text_desc: Stalker, are you alive? There's a hell of a thing going on here... This is the mobile science team in the swamp. Come join us, we have a topic of conversation for you...

objective.text: Talk to the scientists in the swamp.
Talk to the scientists in the swamp

game_task.title: Find the Doctor in the swamp
game_task.text_desc: Doctor. Looks like I'm on my way to him. There's talk of his ability to heal the most grievous of wounds. Perhaps there is a way to restore my memory.

objective.text: Perhaps the Doctor can restore my memory

game_task.title: Talk to the stalker.
game_task.text_desc: esc_talk_dolg_garbage_task_text

objective.text: Talk to a stalker named Boar.
Talk to Boar. Maybe he knows something about the Stalker.

game_task.title: Talk to the stalker.
game_task.text_desc: Hmm. Looks like someone's been following me.

game_task.title: Find the Jackal
game_task.text_desc: jackal_podz

objective.text: Find the stalker Jackal in the dungeons of Cordon, and talk to him.

game_task.title: Explore the catacombs under Cordon
game_task.text_desc: rat_katacombs_quest_article_text

game_task.title: Destroy the Stalker Phantom under the bridge.
game_task.text_desc: You need to destroy the stalker phantom under the bridge. I think the bullets will have to send him back to the other world...

objective.text: Destroy the phantom stalker under the bridge
Destroy the stalker phantom under the bridge.

game_task.text_desc: While Rat is dealing with paperwork and the NII, Toad has decided to pull another job... A certain stalker, who died long ago, appears under the bridge at night... Toad says it's interfering with business...
game_task.title: Wait for the night

objective.text: Wait for the night, and come under the railroad bridge on Cordon

game_task.title: Find the documents
game_task.text_desc: doki_ploty_krisha_article_text

objective.text: Find the documents on the roof of the factory

game_task.title: Get the documents in Dark Valley
game_task.text_desc: dolina_doki_bkoikr_desc

map_location_type.hint: The place where the military was seen

objective.text: Find the documents that the Barkeep needs to get a pass to the bar.

map_location_type.hint: Presumed location of documents for the Barkeep

objective.text: Deliver the documents to the Barkeep

game_task.title: Find the stash of the Jolly Fox.
game_task.text_desc: There's something this peddler isn't telling me... Still, it's worth the money. I need to cross the embankment through the tunnel, and get in touch with a certain Jackal...

objective.text: Go through the drainpipe under the railroad embankment.
Get in touch with the Jackal.

game_task.title: Way to MedPribor Research Institute
game_task.text_desc: esc_start_find_friend_task_text

objective.text: Find a partner to go to MedPribor Research Institute

game_task.title: Find a science suit
game_task.text_desc: You need a science suit in good condition to be in the MedPribor Research Institute.

objective.text: Find a science suit to be able to walk in the MedPribor Research Institute
Find a science suit to be able to walk in the MedPribor Research Institute

game_task.title: Take measurements of anomalous fields
game_task.text_desc: derzzx_dialog_5

objective.text: Come to the place of measurements #1

game_task.title: Bring the Toad's Eye artifact
game_task.text_desc: esc_find_glaz_zabiy_task_text

map_location_type.hint: The place where the Toad's Eye artifact was seen

game_task.title: Bring the artifact from the tower
game_task.text_desc: bar_dolg_propusk_taskt_text

objective.text: Find an artifact from the tower

game_task.title: Meet the stalker
game_task.text_desc: strelby_pms_taskt_text

objective.text: Meet the stalker under the bridge
Destroy the mutant near the factory

game_task.title: Missing squad leader
game_task.text_desc: komandir_kontr_article_text

game_task.title: Trade exchange
game_task.text_desc: 55_tader_1
game_task.objective: Give Ferret ammunition ui\ui_icons_task escape_provodnik -- стори айди olr_5_have olr_5_have

objective.text: Bring artifacts from Ferret to Toad

game_task.title: Bring documents from MedPribor
game_task.text_desc: agr_task_case

objective.text: Find documents at MedPribor Research Institute

game_task.title: Bring documents from the roadblock
game_task.text_desc: 7_propusk_1

game_task.title: Talk to the Barkeep.
game_task.text_desc: Toad doesn't seem to understand much about these papers... Well, it's time to go to the bar...

objective.text: Talk to the Barkeep about the documents you found.

game_task.title: Find and destroy the chimera in Silent Hills.
game_task.text_desc: A chimera has appeared in the village of Silent Hills. You need to find it and destroy it.

objective.text: Find and destroy the chimera in the Silent Hills.

game_task.title: Underground Terrors
game_task.text_desc: You need to find and destroy an unknown mutant from the Rostok factory in the catacombs of the Silent Hills.

game_task.title: Find the entrance
game_task.text_desc: gen_find_exit_lab_d_text

objective.text: Find the entrance to the lab
Find the entrance to the lab

game_task.title: Find and destroy the O-consciousness.
game_task.text_desc: So, I'm here. I've got to end this whole thing.

objective.text: Find and destroy the entity called O-consciousness.

game_task.title: Get out of the lab.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like it's over. We have to get out of here. or--

objective.text: I have to get out of the lab

game_task.title: Make a wish
game_task.text_desc: I think. I know what I want to wish for...

objective.text: Make a wish at the black monolith in the sarcophagus.

game_task.title: To find a dead stalker expedition in the Silent Hills.
game_task.text_desc: mil_go_to_olmy_expedi_text

objective.text: Find the dead stalker expedition that consisted of three stalkers.

game_task.title: Check the high-rise building.
game_task.text_desc: Damn, it seems that there is a sniper with a Gauss hiding in the house... I don't think we can get through. We need to get into the apartment and take him out.

objective.text: Check the apartment where the shot was fired from.

game_task.title: Pump out the water.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like the lower levels are flooded. That's probably where the lower level of the lab is. We need to find a way to pump the water out...

objective.text: Turn on the pump through the control computer.

game_task.title: Destroy the fanatics and find your stuff.
game_task.text_desc: We need to find our stuff. they obviously didn't take it far. We should check the buildings, maybe it's in some crate.

game_task.title: Search the corpse
game_task.text_desc: You need to examine the leader's body.

game_task.title: Search the safe
game_task.text_desc: The leader of the fanatics has some key to the safe. You need to find it and search it.

objective.text: Search the safe of the leader of the Grey Brothers.

game_task.title: Talk to the Professor at Lake Yantar about the way to the center of the Zone.
game_task.text_desc: taken_docs_vetri_pogo_prof_article_text

objective.text: Talk to the Professor at Lake Yantar

game_task.title: Bring the carcasses
game_task.text_desc: You need to get mutant carcasses for the leader of Sin.

objective.text: Shoot 5 rats and 3 crows for Sin's leader.

game_task.title: Bring food
game_task.text_desc: The intelligent zombie in Bright Ray knows something about the Journalist... Asking to be fed.

objective.text: Find two loafs for the zombies

game_task.title: Destroy the Stalkers
game_task.text_desc: A group of stalkers has settled in a place near the passage to the Bar. You need to destroy them for the leader of Sin.
game_task.objective: Arrive at the location green_location aes_sapsan -- стори айди greh_1_start_have

objective.text: Overhear the conversation and destroy the stalkers

game_task.title: Verify the SOS signal.
game_task.text_desc: Freedom group sends an SOS signal in the area of the school. We need to check what happened to them.
game_task.objective: Trust the SOS signal from the Freedom group. green_location 729 -- стори айди trader_ds_dialog_have

game_task.title: Destroy the mutant
game_task.text_desc: ds2_1

objective.text: Destroy the mutant in the Party Committee building.
Destroy the mutant in the Party Committee building

game_task.title: Drive the truck to Cordon
game_task.text_desc: On the Silent Hills, in the village there is a truck, which you need to drive to Cordon, to the gate behind the factory. It seems simple...

objective.text: Drive the truck from the Silent Hills to Cordon

game_task.title: Choice
game_task.text_desc: It seems that the representative is still alive...

objective.text: Approach the entity or go to the surface

game_task.title: Measure the zonal emission
game_task.text_desc: talk_docent_zamer_vibros_article_text

objective.text: Measure in an open area, during the intermediate phase of emission
Bring the fare to the Laboratorian

game_task.title: Find the missing group of scientists in Svetly Lucha
game_task.text_desc: zuudpomosnikz_1

objective.text: Find the missing group of scientists in Svetly Lucha
Find the group and the results of their research

game_task.title: Strange mutant
game_task.text_desc: pseudohuman_first_checkup_go_article_text

objective.text: Find information about a strange mutant that looks like a controller.

game_task.title: Destroy the controllers' lair
game_task.text_desc: In the house of culture there is a den of controllers who do not block the exit to the power plant. You must destroy them all.

objective.text: Destroy the controllers' lair to get to the power plant.
Controllers are blocking the psi-field approach to the power plant, you must destroy them.

game_task.title: Destroy the brain link.
game_task.text_desc: The bodies of four representatives of the o-consciousness project are in cryogenic capsules. It is necessary to try to destroy them...

objective.text: Disable the life support system of all representatives of Project O-Consciousness.

game_task.title: Scan the stalkers, look for zombies on the Silent Hills.
game_task.text_desc: A group of stalkers have appeared on the Silent Hills and have been zombified. You need to scan them with the scientists' device.

objective.text: Scan the stalkers, look for zombies
Check with the device to see who has been zombified.
Scan the bodies of the zombified

game_task.title: Destroy the parasite-infested expedition in Bright Ray
game_task.text_desc: A specific order from the scientists at Yantar... to destroy a group of their colleagues. Apparently, they don't want them in their bunker...

objective.text: Destroy the parasite-ridden expedition in Bright Ray.
Take samples of the parasite at their location.
Collect the personal records of those killed

game_task.title: Infiltrate the hole and remove the source of the strong psi effect.
game_task.text_desc: Near the scientists' bunker there is a hole in the ground that emits some kind of psi radiation. We need to get down there and find the source. Then tell Docent.

objective.text: Get into the hole and remove the source of the strong psi radiation.

game_task.title: Take the scientist to the second science camp.
game_task.text_desc: We need to investigate an old science power plant whose entrance has been mothballed. Some kind of signal is coming from there...

objective.text: Guide the scientist to the second science camp.
Find out what happened in the second camp

game_task.title: Take samples of the parasite
game_task.text_desc: yan_spory_take_task_text

objective.text: Kill the mutant infected with the parasite and sample it with the scientists' device.

game_task.title: Destroy the mutant that is prowling around the Yantar Science Complex
game_task.text_desc: A chimera has been discovered behind the scientific complex of scientists on Lake Yantar. It is necessary to destroy it for the peace of the scientific staff.

objective.text: Destroy the mutant that is prowling around the area

game_task.title: Bring food to the scientists
game_task.text_desc: yan_food_dat_task_text

game_task.title: Guide the scientist to the anomaly
game_task.text_desc: Another job for the scientists. You need to guide the employee to the old pillbox, and if possible, cover him while he does his business...

objective.text: Guide the scientist to the anomaly
Protect the scientist and take measurements

game_task.title: Save the scientist researcher
game_task.text_desc: One of our researchers disappeared two days ago in the area of the road to the bar. We have no one to go looking for him but you. You need to check the place and find him. He's probably dead, but still...

objective.text: Escort the scientist to the base

game_task.title: Take measurements of the psi radiation
game_task.text_desc: It is necessary to make measurements in the old pillbox. To do this you need to switch the device on command, at certain intervals.

objective.text: Take measurements of psi radiation and the dote on Lake Yantar.

game_task.title: Find the scientist
game_task.text_desc: boots_start_gruz_task_text

objective.text: Find the scientist on Cordon and his cargo
Find the scientist on Cordon and his cargo
Deliver the cargo to the Professor at Lake Yantar

game_task.title: Get data from scientists
game_task.text_desc: You need to get data from three scientists that are currently in the zone. The first of them is now in the Dark Valley, he will also be able to tell about the whereabouts of the other scientist with information. For the completion of the task promises improvement for weapons...

objective.text: Talk to the scientist in the swamp about supplying weapons.

game_task.title: Destroy the O-consciousness
game_task.text_desc: descr_yan_find_ghost_task

objective.text: Disconnect the bodies of the merged O-consciousness.

game_task.title: Catch flesh
game_task.text_desc: article_poymat_plot_gm_text

game_task.title: Control the flight of the convoy
game_task.text_desc: article_yan_helieq_task_text

objective.text: Control the flight of the convoy

game_task.title: Talk to Duty's leader.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like the way to the north is still inaccessible... You need to talk to the Duty leader alone at night.

game_task.title: Bunker Defense
game_task.text_desc: You need to repel the wave of mutants that are attacking the scientists' bunker on Yantar.

objective.text: Destroy the pack of monsters attacking the scientists' camp.
Contact the security officer in charge of the lab.
Destroy the pack of monsters attacking the scientists' camp.

game_task.title: Get to the bunker under the Radar
game_task.text_desc: article_bunker_2_olr_text

objective.text: Get to the bunker under Radar
Get into the bunker and cut off the Monolith's power.

game_task.title: Get into the Sarcophagus.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like the way to the sarcophagus is open...

objective.text: Get into the Sarcophagus to see the Black Monolith.

game_task.title: Find out the fate of the Journalist.
game_task.text_desc: doctor_meet_quest_text

objective.text: Find out the fate of the Journalist

game_task.title: Take the container to the village
game_task.text_desc: descr_yan_kill_brain_2

objective.text: Bring the container to the village
Talk to the leader of the Clear Sky

game_task.title: Take Psi radiation measurements
game_task.text_desc: descr_yan_find_scientist_semenov

objective.text: Bring the scientist to the Camp

game_task.title: Disable the psi installation at Lake Yantar
game_task.text_desc: descr_yan_kill_brain

game_task.title: Find Psi Weapon prototypes
game_task.text_desc: descr_yan_find_ghost_task

objective.text: Bring the prototypes to the professor

game_task.title: Talk to the Barkeep.
game_task.text_desc: Looks like the way north is open. we need to talk to the Barkeep.

objective.text: Talk to the Barkeep about the way to the center of the Zone.

game_task.title: Explore the underground rooms underneath the Garbage.
game_task.text_desc: check_gar_rat_cache

objective.text: Explore the underground rooms under the Garbage
Find the entrance and explore the underground rooms under the hangar of the Garbage.

game_task.title: Find the gravity hammer
game_task.text_desc: article_find_gravimolot_text

objective.text: Find the gravity hammer in the basement of the Research Institute.
Talk to the Informant in the Bar

game_task.title: Help a stalker
game_task.text_desc: Someone's in trouble... Maybe we should try to help the guy, there's not much he can tell about this place...

game_task.title: Find Strelok's stash
game_task.text_desc: agr_krot_secret_info

objective.text: Find a stash on the territory of the MedPribor Research Institute.

game_task.title: Find information about the Zone
game_task.text_desc: storyline_seriy_flash_info
